Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Woodlawn
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 79th, Cottage Grove, 83rd, Stony Island and 79th due to, street blockage near 79th/Woodlawn.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Cottage Grove, 83rd, Stony Island and 79th, due to street blockage near 79th/Woodlawn.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #18 16th-18th Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Roosevelt/Michigan

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays from UIC Halsted.



Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
